name: Alolan Marowak
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: The bones it possesses were once its mother’s. Its mother’s regrets have become like a vengeful spirit protecting this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dance of Flames
attacks.effect: For each Energy attached to your opponent’s Pokémon, attach a {R} Energy card from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Burning Bonemerang
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 70 damage for each heads. If either of them is heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned.
